mapper.select: SELECT A.board_id AS boardID, A.title, A.hits, B.nm AS writerNm, A.created_at AS createdAt FROM board A INNER JOIN user B ON A.writer_id = B.user_id ORDER BY A.board_id DESC

SELECT A.board_id AS boardID, A.title, A.contents, A.hits, A.created_at AS createdAt , B.nm AS writerNm, A.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM board A INNER JOIN user B ON A.writer_id = B.user_id WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY A.board_id DESC
